comments:
When formatting the open source gaim code following error is reported in the error log view.

Steps to reproduce:
- Download gaim-1.5.0
- Open the file relnot.c
- Editor context menu: Source > Format

-> The code becomes formatted although the error is reported

Looks like the formatter has problems with following macro outside a block:

GAIM_INIT_PLUGIN(relnot, init_plugin, info)

Warning
Thu May 31 16:13:27 CEST 2007
Syntax error encountered in file: /export1/proj/gaim-1.5.0/plugins/relnot.c at offset: 4,877. (line 164)

org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CodeFormatterVisitor$ASTProblemException: Syntax error encountered in file: /export1/proj/gaim-1.5.0/plugins/relnot.c at offset: 4,877. (line 164)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CodeFormatterVisitor.visit(CodeFormatterVisitor.java:1919)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CodeFormatterVisitor.visit(CodeFormatterVisitor.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.c.CASTProblemDeclaration.accept(CASTProblemDeclaration.java:25)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CodeFormatterVisitor.visit(CodeFormatterVisitor.java:294)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.c.CASTTranslationUnit.accept(CASTTranslationUnit.java:533)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CodeFormatterVisitor.format(CodeFormatterVisitor.java:236)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.formatter.CCodeFormatter.format(CCodeFormatter.java:150)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.corext.util.CodeFormatterUtil.format(CodeFormatterUtil.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CFormattingStrategy.format(CFormattingStrategy.java:61)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.formatter.MultiPassContentFormatter.formatMaster(MultiPassContentFormatter.java:193)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.formatter.MultiPassContentFormatter.format(MultiPassContentFormatter.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.source.SourceViewer.doOperation(SourceViewer.java:818)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.source.projection.ProjectionViewer.doOperation(ProjectionViewer.java:1429)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.editor.CSourceViewer.doOperation(CSourceViewer.java:332)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.editor.CEditor$AdaptedSourceViewer.doOperation(CEditor.java:226)
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.TextOperationAction$1.run(TextOperationAction.java:131)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:67)
	at 
...

I'm using following CDT version:

Eclipse C/C++ Development Tools SDK

Version: 4.0.0.200705251830
Build id: 200705251830

The formatter depends on the AST to format the code, therefore it is sensitive to parsing problems. In case of a syntax error, the problematic area is skipped, but a warning is logged to inform about the problem(s) encountered.
I could reproduce with the example code as long as the scanner configuration was not setup correctly. After an initial build to initialize the scanner configuration, formatting was warning-free.
In other words: This is expected behaviour.

traces.message: Syntax error encountered in file: /export1/proj/gaim-1.5.0/plugins/relnot.c at offset: 4,877. (line 164)
